text: Wallis Grahn (13 February 1945 – 18 January 2018) was a Swedish actress. She was born in Stockholm. She studied at the Adolf Fredriks Musikklasser. She was known for her roles in Pelle Svanslös (1981), the television series Rederiet (1992-1993) and in Wallander - Innan frosten (2005). Grahn died in Stockholm on 18 January 2018 at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Actors from Stockholm
title: Wallis Grahn
